hof.core.utils

Class HallOfFame

  • java.lang.Object
    • hof.core.utils.HallOfFame

  • public class HallOfFame
extends java.lang.Object
    The Hall of Fame stores the best scores in a txt - File in the game directory. If there is no highscore yet, default values are generated. The Hall of Fame is designed as a Singleton.

      • addPlayer

        public void addPlayer(Player player)
        Adds a player to the highscore. The player at the last position is removed.
        Parameters:
        player - - the player to add

      • getHighscore

        public java.lang.String getHighscore()
        Returns the highscore as a String
        Returns:

        -rank-: -name- -points-
